entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:18 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -31.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Inukjuak Airport 9:18 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -31.1°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -34.5°C
Wind: SSW 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind south 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming west 30 before morning. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
